li.label: Werewolf (?)
li.description: NAME could be a shapeshifter that blends forms between man and wolf. When a special moon rises, HE may have HIS first horrific transformation, or something else may happen...

li.label: Werewolf (Unblooded)
li.description: NAME is unknowingly a shapeshifter that blends forms between man and wolf. When a special moon rises, HE will have HIS first horrific transformation.

li.label: Werewolf
li.description: NAME is a shapeshifter that blends its form with that of a wolf.

li.label: Werewolf (Sworn)
li.description: Having sworn a blood oath to their clan in good faith, NAME is a shapeshifter that blends HIS form with that of a wolf, and cannot be recruited.

li.label: Werewolf (Metis)
li.description: NAME is a genetic abberation known as the Metis. Somewhere in HIS genetic line, a werewolf mated with a werewolf and forever corrupted their werewolf line. This Werewolf can only transform into the Metis form.
